Figures

Class Drawing

  • java.lang.Object
    • Figures.Figure
      • Figures.Drawing

  • public class Drawing
extends Figure
    The class Drawing, which extends the abstract class Figure. It is a class composed by other Figures It has the method getComponents to obtain a list of the components. This class is immutable and the parameters can only be obtained with getters.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Ramon de Llano Chamorro
    See Also:
    FigureVisitor
